about_the_game:
🎠 Logic Town - Country Fair DLC 🌽

Step right up and experience the all the joys of Spring in Country Fair, the newest DLC for Logic Town! From thrilling rides to mouth-watering snacks, games, and competitions, there's something for everyone to enjoy in this new bumper expansion.

🦊 Meet Jack, the travelling fairground worker, as you join forces to prepare a picturesque hillside area for the annual extravaganza. As the mastermind behind the festivities, he needs your help in an extra-extra-long chapter featuring over 50 new puzzles!

🧩 Several new puzzle themes that remix existing icons with 6 brand new categories:

  • Thrillseekers Help assemble and configure a series of classic fairground rides.
  • The Bake-Off 6 amateurs whip up their best dishes in attempt to be crowned the best amateur baker.
  • We are the Champignons Who can grow the most enormous tomato? The longest carrot?
  • The Feast Judge who will be crowned in this turbo-charged eating competition.
  • The Grand Day Out Test your skills and win fabulous prizes at the fairground games!

🏆Get your pulse racing on the leaderboards with the new Country Fair Free Play Puzzle Theme!
